title: Add examples in loss.py and functional.py
body_html:
1. loss.py
    Added comments and examples for nn.BCELoss, nn.BCEwithLogitsLoss and nn.SmoothL1Loss.

  2. distance.py
    Added character ' for PyTorch docs.

  3. functional.py
    (1) Changed Example: to Example:: for PyTorch docs.
    (2) Added examples in F.binary_cross_entropy_with_logits, F.binary_cross_entropy and F.cross_entropy.
body_text:
loss.py
Added comments and examples for nn.BCELoss, nn.BCEwithLogitsLoss and nn.SmoothL1Loss.


distance.py
Added character ' for PyTorch docs.


functional.py
(1) Changed Example: to Example:: for PyTorch docs.
(2) Added examples in F.binary_cross_entropy_with_logits, F.binary_cross_entropy and F.cross_entropy.
body:
1. loss.py
Added comments and examples for `nn.BCELoss`, `nn.BCEwithLogitsLoss` and `nn.SmoothL1Loss`.

2. distance.py
Added character ' for PyTorch docs.

3. functional.py
(1) Changed `Example:` to `Example::` for PyTorch docs.
(2) Added examples in `F.binary_cross_entropy_with_logits`, `F.binary_cross_entropy` and `F.cross_entropy`.
